TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: I wonder how this probe came to be on this state of the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>. Perhaps it came from the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> itself?
SOLANUM: If so, there is much we could learn from it. It could answer some of my clan's greatest questions. Perhaps it could even allow us our first true glimpse of the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>.
